title: The Moto G 5G Stylus gets refreshed with a modern 8GB of RAM
content:
The Moto G line has faced some criticism recently, pointed specifically at the Moto G Stylus 2022 and the entire lack of 5G for the time it was released. It seems Motorola is out to fix that with two new reiterations: the Moto G 5G Stylus and Moto G 5G.

moreâ€¦

The post The Moto G 5G Stylus gets refreshed with a modern 8GB of RAM appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Motorola has announced the new Moto G 5G Stylus with better specs and full 5G capabilities - a welcome upgrade to the line.
